TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ResourceExpressionFields extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含已分析资源表达式中的字段。

span.span: Contains the fields from a parsed resource expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 资源表达式中包含的值分析页面时，可以分析和的实例中存储类。When a page is parsed, the values contained in a resource expression are parsed and stored in an instance of the class. 这对象包含两个字段，和。This object contains two fields, and . 这些字段中的显式资源表达式的值中绘制 (`<%$ Resources: ClassKey, ResourceKey %>`) 或隐式 (`meta:resourcekey="ResourceKey"`) 窗体。These fields are drawn from the values of a resource expression in either the explicit (`<%$ Resources: ClassKey, ResourceKey %>`) or implicit (`meta:resourcekey="ResourceKey"`) form. 属性标识映射到的资源文件的资源的类名称。The property identifies the class name of a resource that is mapped to a resource file. 例如，若要引用一个名为 Financial.resx 或如 Financial.en GB.resx 的本地化的版本的资源文件，该资源表达式将显示为`<%$ Resources: Financial, ResourceKey %>`。For example, to reference a resource file named Financial.resx, or a localized version such as Financial.en-GB.resx, the resource expression would appear as `<%$ Resources: Financial, ResourceKey %>`. 分析后,属性将返回"财务"作为其值。After parsing, the property would return "Financial" as its value. 属性标识要从文件中检索特定的键/值对。The property identifies the particular key/value pair to be retrieved from the file. 如果 Financial.resx 文件包含一个密钥称为`Currency`，无法使用资源表达式指定值`<%$ Resources: Financial, Currency %>`。If the Financial.resx file contains a key called `Currency`, that value could be specified with the resource expression `<%$ Resources: Financial, Currency %>`. 分析后,属性将返回"货币"作为其值。After parsing, the property would return "Currency" as its value. 通过分析资源表达式方法。The resource expression is parsed through the method. > [!CAUTION] > 不应存储在资源文件中存储敏感信息。Sensitive information should not be stored in a resource file.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ClassKey As String
public: property System::String ^ ClassKey { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取经过分析的资源表达式的类键。

span.span: Gets the class key for a parsed resource expression.

value.span: 包含类键的 ；如果尚未设置类键，则为 。

span.span: A containing the class key, or if the class key has not been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回经过分析的资源表达式的类键。This method returns the class key for a parsed resource expression. 类别键表示的资源文件的名称，是之前逗号 （，） 形式的表达式中指定的值`<%$ Resources: [Namespace.]ClassKey, ResourceKey $>`。The class key represents the name of the resource file, and is the value specified before the comma (,) in an expression of the form `<%$ Resources: [Namespace.]ClassKey, ResourceKey $>`. 资源类的命名空间值是可选的。A namespace value for the resource class is optional. 时提供的命名空间，在中返回的命名空间和类键属性。When a namespace is provided, the namespace and the class key are returned in the property. 类别键不能包含空格或双字节字符集 (DBCS)。The class key cannot contain spaces or double-byte character sets (DBCS). 若要引用一个名为 Financial.resx 或如 Financial.en GB.resx 的本地化的版本的资源文件，应包括资源表达式 <`%$ Resources: Financial, ResourceKey %>`。To reference a resource file named Financial.resx or a localized version such as Financial.en-GB.resx, you would include the resource expression <`%$ Resources: Financial, ResourceKey %>`. 分析后,属性将返回"财务"作为其值。After parsing, the property would return "Financial" as its value. > [!CAUTION] > 不应存储在资源文件中存储敏感信息。Sensitive information should not be stored in a resource file.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ResourceKey As String
public: property System::String ^ ResourceKey { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取经过分析的资源表达式的资源键。

span.span: Gets the resource key for a parsed resource expression.

value.span: 包含资源键的 ；或者如果尚未设置资源键，则为 。

span.span: A containing the resource key, or if the resource key has not been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回经过分析的资源表达式的资源键。This method returns the resource key for a parsed resource expression. 资源键是后逗号 （，） 形式的表达式中指定的值`<%$ Resources: ClassKey, ResourceKey %>`。The resource key is the value specified after the comma (,) in an expression of the form `<%$ Resources: ClassKey, ResourceKey %>`. 属性标识映射到类键的资源文件中的特定键/值对。The property identifies a particular key/value pair within the resource file mapped to the class key. 例如，如果名为的文件 Financial.resx 包含一个密钥称为`Currency`，无法使用资源表达式指定值`<%$ Resources: Financial, Currency %>`。For example, if a file named Financial.resx contains a key called `Currency`, that value could be specified with the resource expression `<%$ Resources: Financial, Currency %>`. 分析后,属性将返回"货币"作为其值。After parsing, the property would return "Currency" as its value. > [!CAUTION] > 不应存储在资源文件中存储敏感信息。Sensitive information should not be stored in a resource file.
